text:
@AngelaRayner Please remind them to check dates of their Coronavirus Act 2020. It was enacted on 25.March and until that date they had no legal means to impose lockdown. Not that it was not still confusing at the time as lawyers pointed out!
I saw revisionism in my youth in Yugoslavia. Why now
